title: NDIS Virtual Assistant
job_overview:
We are looking for a reliable and experienced NDIS Virtual Assistant to support our team. You will assist with day-to-day administrative tasks related to the National Disability Insurance Scheme (NDIS), helping to ensure smooth and efficient operations.

Your Responsibilities Will Include:

Rostering & Scheduling:
Manage shift changes and cancellations in real time
Ensure client bookings are accurate and rescheduled where needed
Coordinate with support workers and allied health staff on schedule updates

General Operations:
Monitor and organise progress notes and documentation
Maintain clear communication with plan managers, clients, and staff
Help streamline day-to-day admin to reduce workload on the business owner


Who We’re Looking For:
Experience in NDIS, allied health, or in-home care admin support
Confident using platforms like ShiftCare, Invoice Home, and Xero
Highly organised, proactive, and responsive
Skilled at chasing payments diplomatically and tracking financials
Able to work independently while keeping up with a fast-paced and growing business
Comfortable with both client-facing communication and internal coordination

This is a great opportunity to work with a compassionate and community-focused provider that is expanding quickly. You’ll be supporting a hands-on team who are often on the move, so your ability to keep things running smoothly behind the scenes will be highly valued.


Perks:
Flexible working hours
One-year contract with job security
Performance-based rewards and bonuses
Supportive work environment with regular coaching and feedback
Opportunity to grow with the business
HMO coverage for 12 months

To Apply for the Job:
Change the subject line to:
“Ready to Support! I'm your next Virtual Assistant”

(Label this answer 1.)
Send the PUBLIC link of your resume and your video or audio intro

(Label this answer 2.)
Write 2–3 sentences explaining why you would like this position and why you believe you would be a good fit for the role.

(Label this answer 3.)
Briefly describe your experience with the NDIS industry, including any tools you have used, if applicable.

(Label this answer 4.)
Share any experience you have with providing administrative, front-end or back-end support in an NDIS setting.

(Label this answer 5.)
Provide your WhatsApp number for communication.

Make sure to follow all the steps above. Only applicants who follow instructions precisely will be considered.

If selected, you will be invited to a short Zoom interview (camera required).
